original_text: And they commanded the people, saying, When ye see the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God, and the priests the Levites bearing it, then ye shall remove from your place, and go after it.
korean_text: 백성에게 명령하여 이르되 너희는 레위 사람 제사장들이 너희 하나님 여호와의 언약궤 메는 것을 보거든 너희가 있는 곳을 떠나 그 뒤를 따르라

sentences.original_text: When ye see the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너희 하나님 여호와의 언약궤를 볼 때에

sentences.original_text: and the priests the Levites bearing it
then ye shall remove from your place
